groceries.name: ProV Select California Almonds: 1 kg

features: Premium products inspiring healthier choices for nutritional living
Sourced from the finest orchards and choicest suppliers from India and abroad
A step towards wholesome goodness
Any Other Must-Know Information: Allergen advice: Packed in a facility that packs tree nuts. May contain dry fruits and other nuts
Benefits: Almonds are known to be rich in protein
Care Instructions: Store in a cool, dry and hygienic place
